original_text: At the sounding of a second blast, the camps on the south are to set out. The blast will be the signal for setting out.
korean_text: 두 번째로 크게 불 때에는 남쪽 진영들이 행진할 것이라 떠나려 할 때에는 나팔 소리를 크게 불 것이며

sentences.original_text: At the sounding of a second blast
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 나팔 소리가 울릴 때

sentences.original_text: the camps on the south are to set out
The blast will be the signal
